name: CreateAndQueryChangeRequest
description: Gate on status of new change request or an existing change request in ServiceNow.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: ServiceNowConnection
inputs.label: ServiceNow connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the ServiceNow instance used for change management.

inputs.name: changeRequestAction
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Gate on status of new change request or an existing change request.

inputs.name: changeQueryCriteria
inputs.label: Change query criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose criteria for querying change request. Must uniquely identify the change request. Gate would fail if multiple matching change requests are found.

inputs.name: changeRequestNumber
inputs.label: Change request number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Change request to use. Must be a valid change request number in ServiceNow.

inputs.name: queryString
inputs.label: Query string
inputs.helpMarkDown: ServiceNow URL query parameter (sysparm_query) eg. number=CHG0030207.

inputs.name: changeType
inputs.label: Change type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the change request.

inputs.name: standardChangeTemplate
inputs.label: Standard change template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type change template name for the change request.

inputs.name: shortdescription
inputs.label: Short description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Short description of the change request. For releases it can be 'Deployment to $(Release.EnvironmentName) of Release $(Release.ReleaseName)'. For checks it can be 'Deployment to $(system.stageName) of Build $(Build.DefinitionName)'

inputs.name: workNotes
inputs.label: Work notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Work notes to be added for the change request. For release it can be 'Deployment to $(Release.EnvironmentName) of Release $(Release.ReleaseName)  \r\n Release: $(RELEASE.RELEASEWEBURL)'. For checks it can be : 'Deployment to $(system.stageName) of Build $(Build.DefinitionName)'

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the change request. For releases it can be 'Deployment to $(Release.EnvironmentName) of Release $(Release.ReleaseName)'. For checks it can be 'Deployment to $(system.stageName) of Build $(Build.DefinitionName)'

inputs.name: category
inputs.label: Category
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type category (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: priority
inputs.label: Priority
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type priority (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: risk
inputs.label: Risk
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type risk (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: impact
inputs.label: Impact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type impact (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: configurationitem
inputs.label: Configuration item
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type configuration item (display name or sys_id) defined in ServiceNow that is affected by this pipeline.

inputs.name: assignmentgroup
inputs.label: Assignment group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type group of ServiceNow users who can approve and update the change request.

inputs.name: schedulestarttime
inputs.label: Planned start date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Planned start time of the change request in UTC (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format). eg. 2018-01-31T07:56:59Z

inputs.name: scheduleendtime
inputs.label: Planned end date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Planned end time of the change request in UTC (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format). eg. 2018-01-31T07:56:59Z

inputs.name: otherParameters
inputs.label: Additional change request parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional change request properties to set. Specified as Key-value pairs in json format, name being the field name (not label) prefixed with 'u_' in ServiceNow and a valid value. Invalid properties are ignored.

inputs.name: successCriteria
inputs.label: Success criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose success criteria for change request.

inputs.name: DesiredExitStatus
inputs.label: Desired status of change request
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose or type status of change request that indicates the change request is ready to be implemented. Gate would succeed when the the change request status is same as the provided value.

inputs.name: AdvancedSuccessCriteria
inputs.label: Advanced success criteria.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type complex expression for success criteria.

RequestInputs.Body: {  "u_correlation_id": "{{#newGuid}}{{/newGuid}}","u_type": "$(changeType)","u_x_mioms_azpi_eline_metadata": "Release: $(RELEASE.RELEASEWEBURL) \r\n EnvironmentName: $(RELEASE.ENVIRONMENTNAME)", "u_short_description": "$(shortdescription)"{{#equals changeType 'Normal' 1}}{{#if description}}, "u_description": "$(description)"{{/if}}{{#if category}}, "u_category": "$(category)"{{/if}}{{#if priority}}, "u_priority": "$(priority)"{{/if}}{{#if risk}}, "u_risk": "$(risk)"{{/if}}{{#if impact}}, "u_impact": "$(impact)"{{/if}}{{#if configurationitem}}, "u_cmdb_ci": "$(configurationitem)" {{/if}}{{#if assignmentgroup}}, "u_assignment_group": "$(assignmentgroup)"{{/if}}{{/equals}}, "u_requested_by_date": "{{toDateTimeFormat '$(RELEASE.DEPLOYMENT.STARTTIME)' 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss UTC'}}", "u_start_date": "{{#if schedulestarttime}}{{toDateTimeFormat '$(schedulestarttime)' 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss UTC'}}{{/if}}",  "u_end_date": "{{#if scheduleendtime}}{{toDateTimeFormat '$(scheduleendtime)' 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss UTC'}}{{/if}}" {{#if otherParameters}}{{toCommaSeparatedKeyValueList otherParameters true}}{{/if}}{{#equals changeType 'Standard' 1}}{{#if standardChangeTemplate}} , "template_id": "$(standardChangeTemplate)" {{/if}}{{/equals}} }

ExecutionOptions.SkipSectionExpression: or(eq(eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), false), and( eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), eq(eq(taskInputs['changeQueryCriteria'], 'changeRequestNumber'), false)),and( eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), eq(taskInputs['changeQueryCriteria'], 'changeRequestNumber'),eq(isNullOrEmpty(variables['CHANGE_REQUEST_NUMBER']), false)))

or(eq(eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), false), and( eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), eq(eq(taskInputs['changeQueryCriteria'], 'queryString'), false)),and( eq(taskInputs['changeRequestAction'], 'useExisting'), eq(taskInputs['changeQueryCriteria'], 'queryString'),eq(isNullOrEmpty(variables['CHANGE_REQUEST_NUMBER']), false)))
